Text:
Hey shankly, i really like your Uploads. You Music Taste is outstanding! 

But unfortunately i will never load any Piratebay Torrent again after two of my Friends received Letters from Lawyers regarding a copyright violation (Piratebay Downloads). Is there ANY Chance that you could Upload your Mixtapes somewhere else? Greetings, yakuzadude
So maybe this is the end of Shankly's Mixtapes? Can anyone recommend other similar indie music compilations?

RIP Shankster...I'm already missing you and it looks like you won't be back :( . Thanx 4 the music over the last few yrs.

cubit - Birp! and Indie 69 (google them) are alternatives - both pretty good, but don't meet the the ecleptic standards that our shankly tret us to :(
We miss you Shankly! Thank you for all the years of great music! It will be impossible to top your playlists.
you must come back! you simply must
